metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6581 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Nagios NRPE 3.2.1 has Insufficient Filtering because, for example, nasty_metachars interprets \n as the character \ and the character n (not as the \n newline sequence). This can cause command injection.

notes.Note: leosilva> fix in the commit link are the part for proper processing of nasty_metachars

criterions.comment: nagios-nrpe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
